text.name: info3
text.text: Written in: x86 assembly and also used C

text.name: info6
text.text: MS-DOS is an operating system for x86-based personal

text.name: info7
text.text: computers mostly developed by Microsoft. Collectively, MS-DOS,

text.name: info8
text.text: its rebranding as IBM PC DOS, and some operating systems attempting

text.name: info9
text.text: to be compatible with MS-DOS, are sometimes referred to as "DOS".
